arts.ttl: Match report: Bolton Wanderers finish the year in style against Lincoln City
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers claimed a comprehensive win against 10-man Lincoln City to finish off 2024 with a bang.

arts.ttl: Bolton’s Jay Matete at the double as Lincoln pay the price for red card
arts.sum: Ethan Erhahon was sent off at half-time.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers super-fan Ruth Crawshaw has passed away at the age of 82
arts.sum: Ruth Crawshaw, one of Bolton Wanderers' most dedicated supporters, has passed away at the age of 82 following a short illness.

arts.ttl: How Bolton Wanderers could line up against Lincoln City
arts.sum: A look at how Wanderers could line up against Lincoln as the Whites aim to return to winning ways in League One

The pressure is seriously beginning to mount on Bolton boss Ian Evatt after his side fell further off the pace in the race for the play-offs following a late Boxing Day collapse against Barnsley. It'...

arts.ttl: Straight From the Stands: Bolton Wanderers' problems examined, post-Barnsley
arts.sum: Our panel of Bolton Wanderers supporters have their say on the Boxing Day defeat against Barnsley and what happens next for Ian Evatt's side.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers boss Ian Evatt: 'I am not naïve... It needs to change quickly'
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers manager Ian Evatt knows time is not on his side to turn around the club's erratic season in League One.
